seo.metaDescription: $t(frontendDeveloper) specialized in TypeScript, JavaScript, Angular, and React. Based in $t(lucerne), $t(switzerland). Building scalable, high-performance web applications.

siteHeader: Site header with language and theme controls

profileInfo.intro: A $t(frontendDeveloper) passionate about creating intuitive and scalable web applications, based in $t(lucerne).

frontend: 10 years of experience in developing responsive, optimized, and scalable web applications in agile teams using TypeScript and JavaScript technologies, as well as HTML and CSS. Strongly focused on creating intuitive user experiences with clean code.
With a passion for teamwork, I contribute solutions that are based on the latest standards and adapted to real user needs.

responsibilities: Responsibilities
moreExpInfo: For additional work experience prior to 2015, please visit:
moreExpInfoCompact: To see more work experience, visit

about.title: About me
description: I was born in Venezuela with Colombian roots, always driven by a passion for drawing and a curiosity for technology. After graduating in Graphic Design during the early days of the web boom, I quickly became fascinated by web design and development. My curiosity led me to explore programming, which has been at the heart of my professional path since 2015.

Some of these changes came hand in hand with personal challenges, including two migrations and my attitude toward them, has guided me through this professional and personal roller-coaster journey, leading me to places I could never have imagined.
Today, I live in Lucerne with my wonderful family, grateful for the path that brought me here.
